text: Turn around and sadly walk back to the tavern. After you explain the unexpected tragedy to the boss, he only puts one hand on your shoulder and says “We’ll be ok” as one tear runs down his cheek. “Go to the village hall and tell them the news [Character Name], I have insurance so before you know it we’ll be right back on our feet.” The boss orders facing away from you. You numbly walk out the tavern and towards the village… but faintly you hear evil laughter coming from behind you. Congratulations You Have Found The Bad Apple Ending[New Game]
